QuestData.Title: Ancient Armaments
QuestData.Description:
Fighting a war on several fronts has taken its toll on our supplies. Our blacksmiths cannot repair and replace our soldiers' armor quickly enough, which is leaving us ill-equipped to face so many foes.
Though the Amathet's armor is ancient, it is titan-forged and formidable. If we were able to salvage any, it could prove very useful to our defensive efforts.
Can you help?
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect $1oa pieces of Amathet Armor from armored Amathet tol'vir in Uldum.
